subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Kreis’s team had a forgettable inaugural season in Major League Soccer despite having the league’s third-highest payroll. The club said it would have a coach in place in time for the 2016 season.
snippet: Kreis’s team had a forgettable inaugural season in Major League Soccer despite having the league’s third-highest payroll. The club said it would have a coach in place in time for the 2016 season.
